attributes.action: Award Rolf Harris an honourary knighthood for his services to music and art
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned beliive that Rolf Harris has been a leading force in both art and music in not only Great Britain but also the world. He invented one of the greatest musical instruments of modern times (the Stylophone) which helped many youngsters develop a love for music. As a result we believe Rolf should be given an honourary knighthood

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
